paper_abstract: ECC combined public key is a new technology of scalable key management In this paper we propose an identity-based encryption (IBE) scheme using ECC combined public key (CPK) The scheme is based on bilinear maps between groups and proved semantically secure in the random oracle model under a variant of Computational Diffie-Hellman (CDH) assumption-Bilinear Diffie-Hellman (BDH) assumption Crown Copyright (C) 2010 Published by Elsevier Ltd All rights reserved
paper_title: An IBE scheme using ECC combined public key
